org.apache.paimon.mergetree.compact

Interface SortMergeReader<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, RecordReader<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SortMergeReaderWithLoserTree, SortMergeReaderWithMinHeap

    public interface SortMergeReader<T>
extends RecordReader<T>
    This reader is to read a list of RecordReader, which is already sorted by key and sequence number, and perform a sort merge algorithm. KeyValues with the same key will also be combined during sort merging.

    NOTE: KeyValues from the same RecordReader must not contain the same key.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.apache.paimon.reader.RecordReader

        RecordReader.RecordIterator<T>
